no_friend_requests: You haven't received any friend requests

contact_devs: Please contact the developers if you think this is a mistake.

please_enter_email_password: Please enter an email address and a password.
error_invalid_URL_login: Could not get the login URL.
please_enter_valid_email: Please enter a valid email address.
please_enter_valid_phone_number: Please enter a valid telephone number (add '+33' at the beginning).
please_accept_terms_of_use: Please accept the terms of use.
should_contain_capital_letter: Should contain at least one capital letter
should_contain_lower_case_letter: Should contain at least one lower case letter

error_key_already_in_use: This key is already in use.
error_cannot_use_same_key: The same player cannot use the same key for left and right.
error_cannot_use_same_nickname: You can't use the same nickname for more than one player.

problem_with_code: There is a problem with the code. Please try again :)
should_not_contain_spaces: The username must not contain spaces. If not, please change it.

error_creating_local_game: An error occurred while creating a local game.
